Title: Chapter 4
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), John J. Gray, Crystal Liu (executive story editor), Todd Kubrak (story editor), Joshua Green (staff writer)
Actors: Kathy Bates, Sarah Paulson, Cuba Gooding Jr., Lily Rabe
Plot: Shelby and Matt are saved from someone who could help them find Flora. More is learned about the colonist and the Witch.
